Text:
If you were on my first release of the Wonder Years Season 1 torrent, please download this new torrent file,  delete the incomplete episode #2 - swingers, and then resume downloading the torrent.  ;) 

for the rest of you, I hope you enjoy.
The episodes are not all from the same encoder so it varies, but they are all good.
